items.title: Attempts to kill DEI have inadvertently made corporate diversity stronger
items.description: C-suites and boardrooms have been forced to articulate why diversity is essential to financial performance.

items.title: 'Lucrative' business deals help sustain Israel's Gaza campaign, UN expert says
items.description: A U.N. expert has named over60 companies, including major arms manufacturers and technologyfirms, in a report alleging their involvement in supportingIsraeli settlements and military actions in...
